name: module_item_created
definition: The event is emitted anytime a new module item is added to a module by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when a new module item is created.

schema.context_id: The local Canvas id of the context.
schema.context_type: The type of module's context, usually "Course".
schema.module_id: The Canvas id of the module.
schema.module_item_id: The Canvas id of the module item.
schema.position: The position of the module item in the module.
schema.workflow_state: The workflow state of the module item.

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
